about_the_game:
Reborn before the apocalypse, with only a single computer, how many lives can you save?

Stockpiling for the End Times, Striking it Rich  

Each rebirth grants you new growth points, allowing for fresh strategic planning. Gather rumors from various websites, forums, and casual chats, manipulate the stock market, become a prophet, amass wealth, stockpile food and materials in advance, and connect with stronger allies.

 Building a Shelter, Managing Remotely  

Use architectural design software to plan your shelter, assigning companions to tasks like construction, exploration, combat, and recruitment. Cultivate crops, develop technology, and maintain the survival of those unruly citizens, gradually creating a new home capable of withstanding the zombie apocalypse.

Recruiting Allies, Scheduling Tasks  

Discover potential recruits online—explosive gang heiresses, highly skilled exploration bloggers, construction prodigies, and top-tier scientists. Find ways to connect with them, leveraging your rebirth advantage to make them your employees, organizing schedules to collectively maintain the shelter.

Collecting Rumors, Sharing Life Stories  

Repair the network across various regions of Phoenix Harbor, using chat software to reach out to those you’ve met online. Rescue them from the tide of zombies or crowds, and through the internet, use the secrets you’ve gathered to uncover each person’s unique story.

Fighting Zombies, Scavenging  

Deploy the right talents to explore precious resources in the perilous wasteland, entering brutal online doomsday auctions and food warehouses guarded by rival factions. Anticipate the arrival of zombie hordes, producing weapons to defend your shelter.

The apocalypse may spell doom, but this time, life can start anew.

name: Rewrite the Last Days

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10/11
  • Processor: intel CORE i3-3200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT730
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10/11
  • Processor: intel CORE i5-4460 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: You were killed in the zombie crisis. Now, you’re reborn. Your food supply is tied to Phoenix Port’s survivors. Armed with a computer and past-life memories, can you earn money and stockpile goods before the apocalypse? Can you build a refuge, become the apocalypse king,and save Phoenix Port?
